aboutpara: With a solid foundation built over two years of hands-on experience in digital marketing, my previous role centered on web design, SEO, and website analysis. This exposure ignited my interest in UI/UX and web development concepts, prompting my decision to pursue studies in computer science at DVC. My goal is to augment my skills and transition into a role as a web developer, combining my marketing insights with a proficiency in web development for a holistic approach to digital solutions.
